name: RAKSANA CHARITABLE TRUST

address: S K Garden Benson Town Post

briefDescription: Since 2009, Rakshana Home has been working in the areas of rehabilitation of children from vulnerable communities. We currently have two shelter homes both for girls and boys consisting of 30 children in total â€“ 18 girls and 12 boys. At present their age range is between 6 and 16 years. Unfortunately, most of our children come to us from homes in crisis. The children are usually removed from a difficult situation by a family member or the legal system. Rakshana Home acts as a catalyst by providing them a safe, protective environment where more than their basic needs such as food, clothing, shelter and education are met.
